title: Designing Social Studies Microlearning with Generative AI Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized content in a BYOD environment, with instructional design applying the 4PADAFE matrix.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more customized learning scenarios for elementary social studies using generative AI tools.
Learners can develop one or more microlearning modules applying the 4PADAFE matrix.
Learners can cultivate the ability to critically evaluate and improve AI-generated content in the context of social studies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
